text: The Swiss Mixed Doubles Curling Championship is the national championship of mixed doubles curling (one man and one woman) in Switzerland. It has been held annually since the 2013–2014 season. The championships are organized by the Swiss Curling Association.Home - swisscurlingLook at :de:Swisscurling Association ==List of champions and medallists== {|class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2" | Year ! colspan=2|Champion ! colspan=2|Runner-up ! colspan=2| Bronze |- !
